评论详情: Purchased this nearly a year ago and it still is good! Never turned me green ever!!  The metal did fade a bit now, so I will be getting a new one.
This is the max length on the gold necklace. I gave a five star because it arrived on time and I think the length is fine. The necklace is pretty, light weight, and shines nicely.
Bought this as a gift for my cousin who runs track. Love the style but it’s tight around the neck and could be a little wider
